We're here to support you

Our customers have 24 hour a day access to our Help Desk

Go to the Help Desk

Support with zOSEM and CICS/EM products

The Help Desk allows authorized users to perform the following functions:

  • Open a new PMR
  • Review and Update existing PMRs relating to your site
  • Obtain PTF information
  • Download product installation files and manuals
  • Download product maintenance
  • Review Trident newsletters and HIPER PTF advistories
  • Send Dumps to Support (FTP Instructions)

Email Support: support@triserv.com

For support with ESPS, PETS, and other services/products

The Help Desk allows authorized users to perform the following functions:

  • Open a new PMR
  • Review and Update existing PMRs relating to your site

Email Services: esps@triserv.com

General Inquiries
